text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int i , d , n , k ; scanf ( "%d" , & d ) ; int m [ NUM ( d ) ] ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= d * ( d + 1 ) / 2 ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & m [ i ] ) ; int sum = 0 ; while ( d ) { k = 0 ; for ( i = ( ( d * d - d + 2 ) / 2 ) ; i <= ( d * ( d + 1 ) / 2 ) ; i ++ ) { if ( m [ i ] > k ) k = m [ i ] ; } sum = sum + k ; d -- ; if ( d == 1 ) break ; } printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
